dict.acceptation: 开发；（从容器等）汲取（液体）；割[打]开…取[放]液体；
龙头，阀门；塞子；电话窃听；（补鞋的）掌子；

sent.orig: The types of the afterdepolarizations in MAP were very similar to those in TAP.
sent.trans: MAP 上后去极化的形态与 TAP 极为相似。

sent.orig: Link the TAP-tag fragment vector pTRE2hyg, and then get the recombinant vectors into competence cells.
sent.trans: 将TAP-tag片段连接到真核表达载体pTRE2hyg上，并转化感受态细胞。

sent.orig: To test your double-tap settings, double-tap the image. The image changes when your double-tap is successful.
sent.trans: 要测试双点击设置，双点击此图像。点击成功时图像就会改变。

sent.orig: Tap edit, pick one or more messages tap delete, or forward.
sent.trans: 我也能选择转发，或删除多项的彩信信息。

sent.orig: This tap turns easily/It's easy to turn this tap.
